title: 5 Farmers Protecting America’s Food Supply | Big Business | Insider Business
description:
From Colombian farmers protecting the world's bananas from a lethal fungus, to orange producers in Florida, we met farmers around the world using clever techniques to protect America's favorite foods from disease and climate change.
